scripts.dev: docker-compose -f dev/docker-compose.yml up --build ; npm run down
scripts.dev:api: docker-compose -f dev/docker-compose.yml up --build api ; npm run down
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:clean:volumes ; npm run docker:clean:system
scripts.docker:clean:volumes: docker volume rm `docker volume ls -q -f dangling=true`
scripts.down: docker-compose -f dev/docker-compose.yml down ; docker-compose down ; npm run docker:clean
scripts.deploy:web:dev: heroku git:remote -a topstitch-web-dev && git subtree push --prefix packages/web heroku master
